CustomField.formula: IF( (ZB_Units__c - Last_Month_s_ZB_Units__c) > 0, image("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0153b000002z7Ro","UP"), IF( (ZB_Units__c - Last_Month_s_ZB_Units__c) = 0, image("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0153b000002z7Ry","PARTIALLY Converted"), image("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0153b000002z7Rt","Down"))) & " " & TEXT(ZB_Units__c - Last_Month_s_ZB_Units__c)
CustomField.label: Conversion Unit Change
